short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blind accessible hackernews extention, this extension will make HN screen reader friendly for Desktop version of the site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlindHN: Improved Accessibility for Hacker News

This extension streamlines navigation for screen readers by:

	1	Setting the background of the Hacker News website to dark, and the text to white.

	2	Centering and adding a highlight when the user hovers over a title.

	3	Converting title links to h1 elements for a clear hierarchy.

	4	Adding a dedicated right navbar for easy access to navigation options.

	5	Adding aria-labels to describe images, titles, usernames, timestamps, and karma points.

Created by: @theblindprogrammer: https://www.youtube.com/@theblindprogrammer
